Layer.bringToBack

Function/Meaning
Move to back
Type
Method of Layer class
Syntax
bringToBack()
Arguments
None
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Moves the layer to the very back among sibling layers (layers with the same parent) in the stacking order.
Executing this method sets the parent layer's Layer.absoluteOrderMode property to false.
Reference
Layer.order
Layer.absolute
Layer.absoluteOrderMode
Layer.bringToFront
